summary: I HAVE A 2003 YAMAHA GRIZZLY 660. IT HAS A PROBLEM WITH THE FUEL BOILING IN THE CARBURETOR. ONCE IT WARMS UP IT STALLS ESPECIALLY WHEN GOING UPHILL, WHICH COULD EASILY CAUSE IT TO ROLL OVER. I TOOK IT TO THE DEALER, AND THEY TOLD ME THAT YAMAHA WOULD NOT COVER IT ON THE SIX MONTH WARRANTY( I'VE ONLY HAD IT TWO MONTHS).    *NLM
